name: Crowgram
description: Crowgram is a powerful, advanced, multi-featured Telegram userbot.

api_id.description: Collect this value from my.telegram.org and do not share it with anyone.

api_hash.description: Collect this value from my.telegram.org and do not share it with anyone.

string.description: Collect this value by running python3 string_session.py, and never accidentally share it with anyone.

bot_token.description: Collect the assistant bot's token from @BotFather and don't accidentally share it with anyone.

assistant_bot.description: Enter the username of the assistant bot with @.

pm_log_location.description: Enter the group ID of the place you want to collect private messages from.

mention_log_location.description: Enter the group ID of the place where you want to collect the mention message log.
